DISCUSSION .The current study characterizes the expression of candidate regulatory molecules in cuprizone demyelinated corpus callosum to compare conditions of efficient with limited remyelination .Our analysis demonstrates that astrocyte reactivity persists during remyelination , in contrast with transient microglial activation , and therefore may be an important component of the lesion environment during the recovery period to influence remyelination efficiency .
